pullrequest.title: Update the style of collapsible items

content.raw:
The `CollapsibleWidget` was introduced as part of a mechanism to nest widgets into each other. If there is no nesting as proposed on issue #16, then the `CollapsibleWidget` is not needed.

Do you mind elaborating a bit on what's your final vision for the `TopicInterface` plugin and the `Grid3D` plugin? Will they keep sharing the same code, or will `MessageWidget` eventually move towards a panel navigation - which doesn't use collapsibles at all - while the `Grid3D` widget will end up composed of one-level-deep collapsibles?
